Soup Ingredients

Gather these ingredients to make the perfect soup in Grow a Garden.

ü•ï

Carrot

2 √ó Common

Found at: Garden plots (Carrot seeds)

ü•î

2 √ó Common

Found at: Garden plots (Potato seeds)

üßÖ

1 √ó Common

Found at: Garden plots (Onion seeds)

1 √ó Uncommon

Found at: Butcher shop

Found at: Herb garden (special area)

üí° Ingredient Tips

  • ‚Ä¢Higher rarity ingredients will significantly increase your rewards
  • ‚Ä¢Fresh vegetables (harvested same day) give a 15% quality bonus
  • ‚Ä¢Prismatic ingredients can be found during special events or from rare drops
  • ‚Ä¢The 2025 update added special seasonal soups with unique effects

Step-by-Step Cooking Guide

Follow these precise steps to cook the perfect soup in Grow a Garden. Timing is crucial for the best results!

1

Dice Onion and saut√© until translucent

0:00

Low heat prevents onions from burning and becoming bitter

2

Add diced Chicken and cook until browned

1:15

Make sure chicken is evenly browned for best flavor

3

Add chopped Carrots and Potatoes

2:30

Cut vegetables to similar sizes for even cooking

4

Add water and bring to a simmer

3:45

Don't boil too vigorously or vegetables may become mushy

5

Add Herbs and season to taste

5:00

Adding herbs later preserves their flavor

6

Simmer until vegetables are tender and serve

6:30

Soup is ready when potatoes can be easily pierced with a fork

‚ö†Ô∏è

Important Timing Notes

The perfect cooking time for soups is exactly 6 minutes and 30 seconds. Overcooking or undercooking will significantly affect the quality and rewards. Use these visual cues to know your progress:

  • ‚Ä¢0:00-1:15: Onions should become translucent but not brown
  • ‚Ä¢1:15-2:30: Chicken should be evenly browned on all sides
  • ‚Ä¢2:30-3:45: Vegetables should maintain their bright color
  • ‚Ä¢3:45-5:00: The broth should simmer gently, not boil rapidly
  • ‚Ä¢5:00-6:30: Herbs should infuse the broth with their aroma

Rewards & Expert Tips

Learn about the rewards for perfect soups and advanced tips to maximize your benefits.

üèÜ Reward Tiers

Normal Quality

Sheckles (60-90)

Perfect Timing

Deluxe Sheckles (120-170) + Chance for Uncommon Seed

Prismatic Quality

Premium Sheckles (300-400) + Guaranteed Rare Item

üí° Expert Tips

  • The perfect preparation time is exactly 6 minutes and 30 seconds

  • Using higher rarity ingredients will significantly increase rewards

  • Soups are especially popular during Winter Festival events

  • The 2025 update added special seasonal soups with unique effects

  • Soups make excellent gifts for the Raiju character, increasing friendship points by 20%

Recipe Variations

Mushroom Soup

Special Ingredients:
Use Mushrooms instead of Chicken

Effect:
Grants "Forest Wisdom" buff for 25 minutes, increasing foraging yield by 20%

Seafood Soup

Special Ingredients:
Use Fish and Shrimp instead of Chicken

Effect:
Increases fishing skill gain by 15% for 30 minutes

Prismatic Soup

Special Ingredients:
Use all Prismatic-tier ingredients

Effect:
Highest possible rewards, has a chance to attract the Raiju spirit

üåà Prismatic Soup

Legendary Difficulty

The Prismatic version of Soup is a warming delicacy sought after by culinary masters. This legendary dish requires special ingredients and perfect timing, offering exceptional rewards and unique game benefits.

Prismatic Requirements

  • ‚Ä¢All ingredients must be Prismatic-tier quality
  • ‚Ä¢Perfect timing (exactly 6 minutes 30 seconds)
  • ‚Ä¢Must be prepared during Winter Festival events
  • ‚Ä¢Requires the "Soup Specialist" badge (complete 30 perfect soup recipes)

Special Rewards

  • ‚Ä¢Premium Sheckles (300-400)
  • ‚Ä¢Guaranteed Rare Herb Item
  • ‚Ä¢35% chance to attract the Raiju spirit
  • ‚Ä¢"Soup Sage" temporary title (24 hours)
